body:
What kind of game would you develop/code/make? (idk)

I'd develop a police game, sort of like the opposite of GTA. It would be much more detailed then the LCPDFR mod for GTA IV.  You could choose out of 3 maps, each one has its own storyline and vechiles.

 It also has a multiplayer feature. You can have your own custom police car/vechile, or you can go into a session were everyone has the same painted car/vechile.You can a choose to be a fireman, police officer or a yellow man who drives a ambulance (dont know the word for it xd).
Every person has its own caracter.  It will only be available for PC.

sorry if this sounded really weird lol

title: If you were a game developer...

replies.body:
Those sort of games are already made.
For example : APB Reloaded is a free to play GTA like game and has crazy customization and different worlds, there are 3 but 5 modes.
For example : G Mod (garry's mod) has a game mode called Dark RP and you can be a police officer, medic, fireman, the mafia and so on.
So if this game was free and lots of people played it i would'nt bother :P
